title: Very glad Hot is gone.
body:
It never served any real kind of purpose. All of the posts that congregated there were always shitposts that were hard to disagree with or argue with because they didn't say anything important. 

It usually made me annoyed too, because most of the posts would be garbage or would 30 posts about one specific subject, like rengar, kayle, some PR move riot made, or something else that invites a lot of brigading from other areas of the internet.

edit: OOF

replies.body: Hot was just full of upvoted garbage like ''Rengar is op'' or ''Nerf Yasuo'' it was so boring and had nothing interesting.
If they bring it back they should rename it "Hot garbage"

Users now have to go to individual sub forums to look at the most discussed topics.  I don't understand why people think step backwards in functionality is a smart decision purely because it shuts out opinions they don't like. Especially since the only thing that changed is that you forced other people to use the set preference you like.
Eh, there's not a whole lot of shit left to try and read about with it gone. Now this place feels as dead as the EUNE boards.
